mil3.3.4:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.3.4:0.3_0: those who are caught up in conditioned phenomena.
mil3.3.4:1.2_0: “Are there any desire who sees choices who grow old?”
mil3.3.4:1.5_0: “Great king, when there is the eye, sights, eye consciousness, eye contact, feeling, and craving for sights. The painful, pleasant, or neutral feeling that leads to existence.
mil3.3.4:1.6_0: When the eye, sights, eye consciousness doesn’t exist, and there’s no eye contact. When there’s no feeling at all, with the cessation of feeling, craving doesn’t exist. When craving doesn’t come to be.”
